title: The Dead Beat
author: Johnstone, Doug
snippet: John Lamb, 22, was arrested on September 12th after a violent incident on North Bridge. Although North Bridge remained open throughout the incident, Market Street was blocked for several hours afterwards, and Mr Lamb was taken to hospital, along with one other unnamed person. At the hearing, Judge Evans said he believed Mr Lamb continued to be a danger both to himself and others, and he will be held in care until such time as he is no longer considered to be a danger to the public at large.

title: Reheated Cabbage
author: Welsh, Irvine
snippet: Sarah looked up as they crossed Market Street, because Victor was coming towards them. His face, pinched and hard, his classical  self-absorbed look, which broke into one of disbelief, then outraged pain, as he registered them coming towards him hand in hand.

title: The Dead Beat
author: Johnstone, Doug
snippet: At the north end of the bridge, the drop wasn't enough onto the metal roof of the covered platforms. At the south end, the raised curve of Market Street underneath reduced the falling distance by half. So this little gap here, uncovered platform 8, was by far the biggest fall you could manage.

title: Trainspotting
